description.narrative: Youth For Christ Denmark aims to launch a partner identification process. The potential organizations are: 1. Youth For Christ, South Africa. 2. iThemba Projects, South Africa. 3. TruLife, South Africa. All three mentioned organizations have the following similarities with our danish organization: 1. They are all registered non-profit organizations in South Africa. 2. They all work with a primary focus on children and young people. 3. They have all existed fo rmany years and show potential to have the capacity to complete the project. 4. They all work in a non-discriminatory way. 5. They seem to function in a democratic way, but this is our main focus for the pilot project. We hope to embark on a pilot project that will focus primarily on democratic organizational development. The trip will give us enough insight into each organization?s leadership structure, values and work and ultimately allow us to find the correct organization to partner with for a pilot project in 2022.
